from sys import stdin, stdout
t = int(stdin.readline())
while t:
	t -= 1
	n = int(stdin.readline())
	d = []
	for _ in xrange(n):
		a, p = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split(' '))
		d.append([p,a])
		if n>1 and p == 0:
			d.pop()
			n -= 1
	ans = ""
	for i in range(len(d)):
		if i < n-1:
			if d[i][0] == 1:
				ans += str(d[i][1]*(d[i][0]))
			else:
				ans += str(d[i][1]*(d[i][0])) + "x^" + str(d[i][0]-1)
			ans += " + "
		else:
			if d[i][0] == 0 and n == 1:
				ans = "0"
			elif d[i][0] == 1:
				ans += str(d[i][1]*(d[i][0]))
			else:
				ans += str(d[i][1]*(d[i][0])) + "x^" + str(d[i][0]-1)
	stdout.write(ans + '\n')
